featured.text: Rising more than 5,000 feet, Mt. Waialeale stands at the center of the nearly round island.

definition.zh_def: 夏威夷的瓦伊阿雷阿雷山，是世界上降雨量最多的地方之一。
definition.en_def: Waialeale is a mountain in Hawaii known for being one of the wettest places on Earth.
definition.example: Waialeale receives an average of over 450 inches of rain each year.
